name: @sctg/nocors
description: Minimalist noCors proxy for servless app
author: Ronan LE Meillat

scripts.prepare-azure: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cat src/index.ts src/azure.ts | sed -e 's/\.\.\/package\.json/\.\/package\.json/g' >> build/index.ts  && cp -a src/Azure build/ && cp tsconfig.json build/ && cat package.json | sed -e 's/@sctg\/nocors/@sctg\/nocors-azure/g' > build/package.json
scripts.prepare-pages: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cat src/index.ts src/pages.ts | sed -e 's/\.\.\/package\.json/\.\/package\.json/g' >> build/index.ts  && cp -a src/Pages build/ && cp tsconfig.json build/ && cat package.json | sed -e 's/@sctg\/nocors/@sctg\/nocors-pages/g' > build/package.json
scripts.build-azure: npm run prepare-azure && npm run build
scripts.build-pages: npm run prepare-pages && npm run build
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && cd build && npm run _build
